170.title: permissionDecision: 'deny' in PreToolUse hook causes missing tool_result
170.reason: Common hook usage pattern with clear workaround, causes API 400 errors

169.title: HTTP MCP Servers Fail Behind Corporate Proxy
169.reason: Critical blocker for enterprise adoption, no current workaround except switching to SSE/stdio

168.title: thinking: { type: 'adaptive' } silently disables thinking
168.reason: SDK docs recommend using thinking option but it breaks thinking, has clear workaround

158.title: Subagents unable to inherit createSdkMcpServer MCPs
158.reason: Fixed in v0.2.34 per user comment, issue already resolved

157.title: ANTHROPIC_LOG=debug corrupts SDK protocol
157.reason: Breaks standard debugging workflow, has clear workaround via debug option

156.title: SDK incompatibility with Claude Code 2.1.x --verbose flag
156.reason: Closed issue, reporter said it was fly.io specific, not a general SDK bug

155.title: Invalid model ID causes opaque schema validation crash
155.reason: Closed as not reproducible by maintainer

151.title: Breaking: Duplicate tool_use IDs in v0.2.19
151.reason: Fixed in v0.2.20, no longer relevant

150.title: SDK fails to discover bundled CLI when bundled with bun build
150.reason: Clear use case (bundling), known root cause, has workaround

147.title: Add support for listing claude code past sessions
147.reason: Feature request, not a bug or known issue

130.title: Async subagents error with 'only prompt commands are supported in streaming mode'
130.reason: Closed, supposedly fixed in CLI 2.1.7, though one user reported still seeing it in 2.1.16

114.title: MCP server responses don't reset lastActivityTime
114.reason: Well-documented issue with verified community patch, affects query performance and reliability

161.title: ReferenceError: Bun is not defined when running with Node.js
161.reason: False report, closed by author as agentic bug report error
